counters.header: Create custom counters, control them from {LINK_TRIGGER} and {LINK_OVERLAY} on your stream.
counters.premium_cannot_enable: You cannot enable this counter back. You reached the maximum of {MAX} counters that can be enabled. Become premium to create up to {MAX_PREMIUM} counters.
counters.connect_youtube:
Twitchat is not connected with YouTube.
YouTube user info cannot be retrieved.
counters.premium_limit: You created the maximum number of {MAX} counters. Become premium to create up to {MAX_PREMIUM} counters. Or disable / delete some counters to create new ones.

form.name: Name
form.placholder_tt:
This value will allow you
to get this counter's value
in any trigger action
form.placholder_conflict: Another counter already uses this placeholder
form.name_conflict: Another counter with the same name already exists
form.value_loop: Loop value when reaching min or max
form.value_user: Every user has their own counter
